Name: Monster Phenomenon
About the game: New attack on Earth. A monster that wants to get rid of all people. Moving between levels destroys everyone in its path. But people have already invented many weapons with which they still want to kill alien evil. Monster Phenomenon - A platform game where you control an alien monster with three tentacles that moves only by sticking its tentacles to the surface and killing people on its way. You'd better hurry, people strive to bring down the evil they don't like. Game Features: - Point Control -Pixel Art - Difficulty levels - Pleasant musical accompaniment
